mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_title, board_content, user_key, board_create_dt, board_update_dt) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{userId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, u.user_nickname FROM board b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_key = u.user_key WHERE board_id = #{id}

SELECT CASE WHEN user_key = #{userKey} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM board WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
